entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as running forward to help. He is described as part of a group with Ron and Hermione.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron is mentioned as running forward to help, along with Harry and Hermione.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as running forward to help, along with Ron and Harry.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is mentioned as dueling a man who turns out to be Minister Thicknesse. He is also described as joking about resigning.

entities.name: thicknesse
entities.description: Thicknesse is mentioned as being dueling Percy, and later falls to the ground with tiny spikes erupting all over him.

entities.name: fred
entities.description: Fred is mentioned as battling a Death Eater and joking about Percy's resignation.

relationships.description: Harry, Ron, Hermione, Fred, and Percy are grouped together. This is mentioned in the sentence: 'They had been grouped together...'

Percy is dueling a man who turns out to be Minister Thicknesse. This is mentioned in the sentence: 'Harry, Ron, and Hermione ran forward to help: Jets of light flew in every direction and the man dueling Percy backed off...'
